node.label: Xie Lair Entrance
node.popup: Close to the location of __Xie Jia__'s murder is a boathouse owned by __[[Xie|xiemanor]]__ clan. Inside, a secret entrance is hidden behind a thick wooden wall panel and barred by powerful magic.

node.label: Xie Jia's Murder
node.sidebar: The bloody murder of __Xie Jia__ occured here. A gothic portrait of her with flowers and condolence notes can be found at the scene. In the portrait Xie Jia appears young, pale, with a red cross painted on her face. Previously, the connection of this murder to the disapperance and kidnapping of [[Princess Orihime]](linshung) was not known. The Knights of Schedule now know that the murder itself is a lie.

node.label: Docks
node.sidebar: The ports and docks of Yu Tai Shuni are under the control of the __Gankou__ clan.

node.label: Tavern
node.popup: The Knights of Schedule are staying at this tavern when they meet Black Chao. The Knights are interviewed here by __Mei Mei__ before they change establishments to escape notice of Xie clan.

node.label: Docks
node.sidebar: The ports and docks of Yu Tai Shuni are under the control of the __Gankou__ clan.

node.label: Xie Manor
node.popup: Main residence of the __Xie__ clan. Here the Knights of Schedule visit __Xie Jo Jia__, __Xie Jia__'s son and successor. The atmosphere inside the mansion gives off strange vibes - silver, preserved skulls; gothic artwork; grotesque poses; a black table with a reflecting surface like a mirror. Xie Jo Jia abandons this manor after Xie Jia is found mysteriously alive in the lair beneath __Xie boathouse__.

node.label: Naval Academy
node.popup: Though __Gankou__ clan controls the city administration, the Naval Academy is under the control of __[[Xie|xiemanor]]__ clan.

node.label: Sewer Entrance
node.popup: Some kidnappings in Yu Tai Shuni occur around the time [[Princess Orihime]](linshung) disappears. The victims are men and women, mostly young. Blood is spread around the city, often near manhole covers. Lythara sends an *arcane eye* down a manhole to gather more information, but no clues are found in the underground maze.
